content: The 3,000 square foot ballroom offers floor-to-ceiling windows and sweeping views of Park Avenue South with a neutral palate that becomes your blank canvas. This versatile space is divisible by two with separate entrances, private pre-function areas, and an intimate patio for open-air catering. The ballroom is equipped with state-of-the-art audiovisual systems, and complimentary high-speed wireless Internet.
